# Add TERRAGRUNT_SOURCE_UPDATE env var

**brikis98** commented *Dec 1, 2017*

You can now use the environment variable `TERRAGRUNT_SOURCE_UPDATE` instead of the flag `--terragrunt-source-update`. This is useful when some other script is calling Terragrunt on your behalf and you canâ€™t override the flags it uses.
